partial_progress.details: Phases 1-2 complete with 0 sorries. Phase 3 blocked on canonical_reachable_linear theorem. Syntactic MCS-level approaches create circular dependencies. Frame correspondence semantic argument is recommended but requires significant mathematical machinery.
